parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs. The value of this parameter must be the same as the application name for the live stream that you want to relay. Otherwise, the configuration does not take effect. You can view the application name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: DstUrl
parameters.description: The third-party URL to which the live stream is relayed.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream. You can view the stream name on the [Stream Management](~~197397~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
